entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight then changing to periods of rain before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
